name: Robusto Deluxe
additionalNotes: Made in the La Aurora factory in the Dominican Republic, the country's oldest factory, Leon Jimenes Robusto Natural cigars are a distinctive, well-made Dominican cigar brand blended with the highest grade USA Connecticut Shade wrappers and Dominican fillers. Since 1987, when the Miranda family revived the brand, Leon Jimenes Robusto cigars have grown exponentially in demand for their mild taste, easy draw, excellent balance and exquisite aroma.
